We're Hiring Social Media Presenters for Hong Kong

Are you outgoing? Interested in technology? Social media? The future?

Want to join our social media crew as a Presenter?

We have a part-time role that could be just right for you.

BeachCity Media travel the globe in search of inspiring entrepreneurs and innovation hotspots. When we rock up to the biggest tech events and startup hubs, we don't just hobnob with the suits, we're your boots on the ground, sharing stories and insights straight from the people building the future.

We interview the world's brightest founders, mentors and investors, sharing startup stories and incredible lessons in entrepreneurship

 

What we are looking for

Storytellers…

Entrepreneurs…

Travellers…

Young people that are excited about life, technology and opportunity… great attitude needed!

 

What you need

Increase your social media profile, share interesting and inspiring stories of young entrepreneurs

This position would suit a university student.

 

When

2-Day full time gig on 31st October - 1st November

Hong Kong - Fintech Week, Hong Kong

Plus additional part time local entrepreneurial / start up ecosystem coverage after the event.

 

Negotiable hourly rate depending on your experience.
